verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. O God <S%H430><s%>, the nations <S%H1471><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> into thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>; Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%> have they defiled <S%H2930><s%>; They have laid <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in heaps <S%H5856><s%>.

The dead bodies <S%H5038><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> have they given <S%H5414><s%> to be food <S%H3978><s%> unto the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, The flesh <S%H1320><s%> of thy saints <S%H2623><s%> unto the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Their blood <S%H1818><s%> have they shed <S%H8210><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; And there was none to bury them <S%H6912><s%>.
We are become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, A scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and derision <S%H7047><s%> to them that are round about us <S%H5439><s%>.
How long <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah? wilt thou be angry <S%H599><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>? Shall thy jealousy <S%H7068><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%>?

Pour out <S%H8210><s%> thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the nations <S%H1471><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> thee not <S%H4467><s%>, And upon the kingdoms that call <S%H7121><s%> not upon thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
For they have devoured <S%H398><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, And laid waste <S%H8074><s%> his habitation <S%H5116><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not against us the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our forefathers <S%H7223><s%>: Let thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> speedily <S%H4118><s%> meet <S%H6923><s%> us <S%H1809><s%>; For we are brought very <S%H3966><s%> low <S%H1809><s%>.

Help <S%H5826><s%> us <S%H430><s%>, O God of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>, for <S%H1697><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of thy name <S%H8034><s%>; And deliver <S%H5337><s%> us <S%H3722><s%>, and forgive our sins <S%H2403><s%>, for thy name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake.

Wherefore should the nations <S%H1471><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Where is their God <S%H430><s%>? Let the avenging <S%H5360><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> which is shed <S%H8210><s%> Be known <S%H3045><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> in our sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Let the sighing <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner <S%H615><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H1433><s%>: According to the greatness of thy power <S%H2220><s%> preserve <S%H3498><s%> thou those that are appointed <S%H1121><s%> to death <S%H8546><s%>;

And render <S%H7725><s%> unto our neighbors <S%H7934><s%> sevenfold <S%H7659><s%> into their bosom <S%H2436><s%> Their reproach <S%H2781><s%>, wherewith they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> thee <S%H136><s%>, O Lord.

So we thy people <S%H5971><s%> and sheep <S%H6629><s%> of thy pasture <S%H4830><s%> Will give thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: We will show forth <S%H5608><s%> thy praise <S%H8416><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
